flavorText:
"I swear the clouds were created just so the drakes would have a place to lurk."
—Kasharri, skyknight

foreignData.flavorText:
„Ich könnte schwören, dass es Wolken nur deswegen gibt, damit Sceadas in ihnen lauern können."
—Kasharri, Himmelsritter
foreignData.name: Peitschenrückensceada
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
Morph {2}{W} (Du kannst diese Karte verdeckt für {3} als eine 2/2 Kreatur wirken. Decke sie zu einem beliebigen Zeitpunkt für ihre Morph-Kosten auf.)

foreignData.flavorText:
"Juraría que las nubes fueron creadas solo para que los dracos tengan un lugar desde donde acechar".
—Kásharri, caballera celeste
foreignData.name: Draco espinazo de látigo
foreignData.text:
Vuela.
Metamorfosis {2}{W}. (Puedes lanzar esta carta boca abajo como una criatura 2/2 pagando {3}. Ponla boca arriba en cualquier momento pagando su coste de metamorfosis.)

foreignData.flavorText:
« Je suis sûre que les nuages ont été créés uniquement pour cacher les drakôns. »
—Kasharri, chevalier céleste

foreignData.flavorText:
"T'assicuro che le nuvole sono state create perché i draghetti avessero un posto per nascondersi."
—Kasharri, cavaliera dei cieli
foreignData.name: Draghetto Spinafrusta
foreignData.text:

Metamorfosi {2}{W} (Puoi lanciare questa carta a faccia in giù come una creatura 2/2 pagando {3}. Girala a faccia in su in qualsiasi momento pagando il suo costo di metamorfosi.)

foreignData.flavorText:

name: Whip-Spine Drake
originalText:
Flying
Morph {2}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

rulings.text: If Whip-Spine Drake is face down and blocked by a creature without flying, turning it face up won’t cause it to become unblocked or stop the blocking creature from dealing combat damage to it.
